artist: Engraver: Francesco Rosaspina; Artist: After Francisco Albani
description: John the Baptist at right pouring water on head of Jesus at left; two angels supporting Christ; dove above cup which is pouring water; at top angels, cherubs and Father; bound in volume 1
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [F. Albini del   F. Rosaspina dis. e. inc/ IL BATTESIMO DI GESU CRISTO]; in pencil below image and on verso: [1-8];
title: Il Battesimo Di Gesù Cristo
